column1: A mass of Christian burial will be celebrated at Sacred Heart of Mary Catholic Church 6736 Youngstown Ave. Dundalk
column2: MD 21222 on Wednesday at 10 AM. Interment Sacred Heart of Mary Cemetery. Friends may call at the family owned Duda-Ruck Funeral Home of Dundalk Inc. 7922 Wise Ave on Tuesday from 3-5 and 7-9 PM.
